backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, titles, affected files, and metadata for recent frontend refactors and enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of key frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining global OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and shared utility defaults for the static HTML entrypoint.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting SEO metadata and mounting the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that renders the LandingPage component.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with sticky navigation, service rate cards, a UPI payment section with fadeâ€‘in animation, and a minimal footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, storing identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with OKLCH tokens, custom brand colors, font settings, and accessibility focus-visible rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint that mounts the app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system via CSS variables, custom radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state metadata and enumerates existing features, including ICP canister integration, Internet Identity auth, shadcn/ui setup, and the cleaning-service landing page components.
